title: Herbal Medicine — Onsite Holistic & Integrative Medicine
cleaned_text: Herbal Medicine Herbal medicine has a long history of use in societies throughout the world. Herbs are natural botanical substances with specific therapeutic functions in the body. For example, have you ever used ginger tea to aid with nausea or digestive upset? If so, you have used herbal medicine. Ginger is just one of many herbs that can be used to promote health throughout the body. Your practitioner will prescribe a combination of herbs known as an herbal formula that is customized to your unique needs and health concerns.
